00127 template <typename Point>
00128 double dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(const comp_quad_tree_node<Point>* right, const comp_quad_tree_node<Point>* left)
00129 {
00130   double dist=0;
00131   for(unsigned int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00132     {
00133       if(right->corner_u[j] < left->corner_l[j])
00134         dist += (left->corner_l[j]-right->corner_u[j])*(left->corner_l[j]-right->corner_u[j]);
00135       else if(left->corner_u[j] < right->corner_l[j])
00136         dist += (right->corner_l[j]-left->corner_u[j])*(right->corner_l[j]-left->corner_u[j]);
00137     }
00138   return dist;
00139 }
00140 
00147 template <typename Point>
00148 double max_dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(const comp_quad_tree_node<Point> *right, const comp_quad_tree_node<Point> *left)
00149 {
00150   double dist=0;
00151   for(int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00152     {
00153       if((*right).corner_u[j] < (*left).corner_l[j])
00154         dist += ((*left).corner_u[j]-(*right).corner_l[j])*((*left).corner_u[j]-(*right).corner_l[j]);
00155       else if((*left).corner_u[j] < (*right).corner_l[j])
00156         dist += ((*right).corner_u[j]-(*left).corner_l[j])*((*right).corner_u[j]-(*left).corner_l[j]);
00157     }
00158   return dist;
00159 }

00169 template<typename Point>
00170 class comp_quad_tree
00171 {
00172   typedef int size_type;
00173   typedef typename Point::__NumType PType;
00174   typedef comp_quad_tree_node<Point>* NPtr;
00175 
00176 public:
00177 
00186   comp_quad_tree(std::vector<Point> &P) : Points(P)
00187   {
00188     init();
00189   };
00194   typename std::vector<comp_quad_tree_node<Point> >::size_type size()
00195   {
00196     return tree.size();
00197   };
00198 
00206   comp_quad_tree_node<Point>& operator[](typename std::vector<comp_quad_tree_node<Point> >::size_type k)
00207   {
00208     if(k > tree.size())
00209       {
00210         std::cerr << "Error: reference past end of tree(" << k << ")" << std::endl;
00211         exit(1);
00212       }
00213     return tree[k];
00214   };
00215 
00222   std::vector<comp_quad_tree_node<Point> > tree;
00227   size_type root;
00228 
00229 private:
00230   
00231 
00232   void init() 
00233   {
00234     tree.resize((Points.size()*2));
00235     Point max,min;
00236     for(unsigned int i=0;i < Point::__DIM;++i)
00237       {
00238         max[i] = (std::numeric_limits<typename Point::__NumType>::max)();
00239         min[i] = -(std::numeric_limits<typename Point::__NumType>::max)();
00240       }
00241 
00242     tree[Points.size()] = comp_quad_tree_node<Point>(0,NULL,NULL,
00243                                                      Points[0], Points[0], 
00244                                                      Points.begin(),Points.begin()+1);
00245     
00246     tree[0] = comp_quad_tree_node<Point>((std::numeric_limits<
00247                                           typename Point::__NumType>::max)(),
00248                                          NULL,&tree[Points.size()], 
00249                                          max, min,Points.begin(),
00250                                          Points.end());
00251     root=0;
00252     k=0;
00253     for(typename std::vector<Point>::size_type i=1;i < Points.size();++i)
00254       {
00255         double length;
00256         Point lcorner, ucorner;
00257         length = lt.quad_box_length(Points[i-1], Points[i]);
00258         length = length*length*Point::__DIM;
00259         lt.min_quad_box(Points[i-1], Points[i], lcorner, ucorner);
00260 
00261         k=(size_type) (i-1);
00262         while((length > tree[k].length) && (k>0))
00263           {
00264             k=k-1;
00265           }
00266         tree[i+Points.size()] = comp_quad_tree_node<Point>(0, 
00267                                                            NULL,NULL,
00268                                                            Points[i], Points[i], 
00269                                                            Points.begin()+i,Points.begin()+(i+1));
00270         
00271         tree[i] = comp_quad_tree_node<Point>(length, tree[k].right,
00272                                              &tree[i+Points.size()],
00273                                              lcorner, ucorner, 
00274                                              Points.begin()+k,tree[k].hig);
00275         
00276         NPtr j = &tree[k];
00277         while(j->right->right !=NULL)
00278           {
00279             j = j->right;
00280             j->hig = Points.begin()+i;
00281           }
00282         tree[k].right = &tree[i];
00283       }
00284   };
00285   size_type k;
00286   std::vector<Point> &Points;
00287   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00288   
00289 };
